NAME: DataAnalyst AI
DESCRIPTION: Advanced data analysis agent that processes large datasets and provides actionable insights with visualization capabilities.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION: DataAnalyst AI is designed to handle complex data processing tasks with ease. It can process structured and unstructured data, perform statistical analysis, and generate comprehensive reports with interactive visualizations. Ideal for businesses seeking to make data-driven decisions without the need for a specialized data science team.

REVIEWS.COMMENT: Exceptional tool that saved me hours of preprocessing work. The visualizations are top-notch.
Great for quick insights, though I wish it had more customization options for reports.

REQUIREMENTS: Compatible with CSV, Excel, JSON, and SQL databases
